info.description: This provides the REST API for Pulsar Packages operations
info.title: Pulsar Packages REST API

get.summary: Get all the specified type packages in a namespace.

200.description: Return all the specified type package names in the specified namespace.

503.description: Package Management Service is not enabled in the broker.

get.summary: Get all the versions of a package.

200.description: Return the package versions of the specified package.

404.description: The specified package is not existent.

503.description: Package Management Service is not enabled in the broker.

get.summary: Download a package with the package name.

404.description: The specified package is not existent.

503.description: Package Management Service is not enabled in the broker.
Package Management Service is not enabled in the broker.

delete.summary: Delete a package with the package name.

404.description: The specified package is not existent.

503.description: Package Management Service is not enabled in the broker.

get.summary: Get the metadata of a package.

200.description: Return the metadata of the specified package.

404.description: The specified package is not existent.

503.description: Package Management Service is not enabled in the broker.

put.summary: Update the metadata of a package.

200.description: Update the metadata of the specified package successfully.

404.description: The specified package is not existent.

503.description: Package Management Service is not enabled in the broker.
